meanings.definition: A plant that has vascular tissue for the transport of water and nutrients.
meanings.sent1: The tracheophyte in the garden had tubes inside to carry water and food.
meanings.sent2: The tracheophyte in the forest had special tubes to move water and nutrients.
meanings.sent3: The tracheophyte was so thirsty, it drank up all the water in the soil!
meanings.sent4: The tracheophyte stood tall like a straw, sipping water from the ground.
meanings.sent5: The tracheophyte's tubes were like tiny straws, sucking up water like a straw in a drink.

meanings.definition: Any plant of the division Tracheophyta, comprising the vascular plants.
meanings.sent1: The tracheophyte near the river belonged to the Tracheophyta group.
meanings.sent2: The tracheophyte in the park was a member of the Tracheophyta division.
meanings.sent3: The tracheophyte from Tracheophyta division had a party with other plants.
meanings.sent4: The tracheophyte, like a Tracheophyta soldier, stood proudly among the plants.
meanings.sent5: The tracheophyte, a Tracheophyta member, was like a noble in the plant kingdom.
